translation.name: Yago
translation.mainD: I'm a fullstack developer focused on creating web applications with a passion for solving technological challenges.
translation.aboutSb: My name is Yago, I am a web developer, and I have been working in the field for about a year. I have a solid experience in both front-end and back-end, and I am always eager to learn and evolve. I am excited to collaborate on challenging projects and contribute to talented teams.
translation.aboutSb2: My passion for technology began in 2020 when I was creating websites on platforms like Shopify and Cartpanda for an e-commerce business I had. In 2021, I entered the programming field with a focus on getting hands-on experience and developing layouts with modern and appealing designs, along with a well-structured server-side component.
translation.aboutSb3: I have knowledge and experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, React, and Express. I study every day to explore various ways to enhance my results through programming, so I am always researching new technologies and specializing in the ones I already know. Additionally, I am delving deeper into the Spring framework with Java.
